title: Malvan-Tarkarli Backpacking trip
location: Malvan-Tarkarli Beach, Tal. Malvan Dis. Sindhudurg

itinerary.description: Saturday Night Leave from Pune 09.00 pm Pickup First pickup 01 : Shivaji Nagar Infront of Maharashtra Bank Second Pickup 02 : Chandni chowk
06:00 AM We Reach Malvan
07.00 AM Check-in for Room & have Breakfast
09:00 AM Leave for Malvan Chivla beach for Water sports
10:00 AM Water Sport Registration
11:00 AM Doing Watersports Activities
03:00 PM Back to Hotel freshnup and get Lunch and Take Rest
05:30 PM Travel to Rock Garden
06:30 PM Sunset View Rock Garden Beach Side
07:00 PM Group Activities on Beach Side
08:00 PM Back to Hotel
09:00 PM Dinner
10:30 PM Sleep
06:00 AM Wake up call
06:30 AM Going to Tarkarli Beach for Sunrise
08:30 AM Back to Hotel and take Breakfast
09:30 AM Check out from Hotel and Leave for Sindhudurg Fort
11:00 AM Reach Sindhudurg fort
02:00 PM Take Lunch
03:30 PM Leave for Tsunami Island
05:00 PM Start Return Journey with Beautiful Memories
10:00 PM Reach Kolhapur
10:30 PM Dinner at Kolhapur (Not Include in Cost)
Start Return Journey to Pune / Mumbai
Return Monday Early Morning Till 5.00 AM Max 05:00 AM : Reach Pune , Max 10:00 AM : Reach Mumbai

costInclude.item: Travelling by Non AC private bus
05 Water Activities (With Best Trained Guides)(Scuba, Parasailing, Bumper Ride, Jetski Ride & Banana Ride)

costExclude.item: Dinner (Our captains will provide you with the best options we can offer you)
Any tea/breakfast expenses you take over the travel breaks

thingsToCarry.item: Full pants and full sleeves t-shirts to protect from tanning, thorns, insects during the trek
Snacks (Energy bars, Chikki, Biscuits, Sprouts, Chips, Dry fruits)
Please carry a  Jacket & cover your phones also in a plastic cover

pune.location: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj bus stop (Shivajinagar Pune) In front of Bank of Maharashtra

faqs.question: Do we need to know swimming for Water activities ?
faqs.answer: There is no such requirement as our experts will be there with you for help

faqs.question: Is this trek safe for girls?
faqs.answer: This trek is completely safe for girls. We have girl volunteers specially appointed for girls. And have separate changing rooms.

faqs.question: How many trek leaders will be available?
faqs.answer: There will be 01 trek leader available for a group of 8 people in each trek.

faqs.question: How do I get in touch with trek leaders and trek groups ?
faqs.answer: We add participants in our Whatsapp group one day prior to the event.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my booking?
faqs.answer: You can check our cancel policy for the same. Or you can join us on the next trek (please inform us before 2 days)

faqs.question: What is prohibited in this trek?
faqs.answer: Smoking, Drinking and undesclipined behaviour is prohibited

faqs.question: Are changing rooms provided?
faqs.answer: Yes, separate (Male/Female) changing rooms are provided.

faqs.question: What is the type of bus ?
faqs.answer: The bus is NON/AC Tempo Traveler with decent seating comfort.

faqs.question: Are washrooms available on the trek?
faqs.answer: Washrooms are available at the base village only. No facility is available during the trek.

faqs.question: Pick up points
faqs.answer: Pick up is available if your location comes in between our route for this you have to contact us before.
